Description:
This is a full-time on-site role for a Marketing Manager located in Dhahran. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for the following:Conduct market research to identify trends and opportunities
Develop and implement strategic marketing plans to achieve business objectives
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including sales, operations, and culinary departments to ensure successful execution of marketing initiatives.
Manage social media accounts and create content for various platforms.
Establish communication with influencers and work with them to achieve marketing objectives.
Analyze marketing data and adjust marketing strategies as neededSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field required
5+ years of experience in marketing and/or advertising with at least 1 year in F&B
Strong understanding of market research and analysis.
Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns
Experience with influencer marketing
Experience managing social media accounts
Good understanding of SEO/SEM, email marketing, event planning, customer acquisition, and retention strategies
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and interact effectively with management and stakeholders
Creative problem-solver with a can-do attitude and willingness to take initiative
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Arabic
